alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 2:23PM CST until February 18 at 2:55AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Scott and Hancock Counties. Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Claiborne and Hancock Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Union and Claiborne Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Lee and Hancock Counties. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Marion, Sequatchie and Bledsoe Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Tennessee... Emory River At Oakdale TN affecting Morgan and Roane Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Powell River near Jonesville VA. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, The river invades several fields and reaches a few farm buildings. At 20.0 feet, Low lying sections of Routes 641 and 783 are affected and some private driveways are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 PM EST Friday was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 3.3 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 430 PM EST /330 PM CST/.
